alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:07PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Alfalfa and southwestern Grant Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 207 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Nash, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pond Creek, Wakita, Nash, Jefferson, and eastern Great Salt Plains Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
